entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Low 6.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
